oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Martha White Flour Co. Job No. 38794
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm); Flatt, Lester; Scruggs, Earl;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 3302) for an order placed by the Martha White Four Company for 25 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Nantahala High School Auditorium in Natahala, North Carolina on September 7, 100 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs in Reidsville, North Carolina on September 8, 100 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at Keowee Elementary School in Seneca, South Carolina on September 9, and 50 two color window cards for a performance by Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at Lee's Jr. College in Jackson, Kentucky on September 16. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
